episodes.synopsis: Carpathia awaits the arrival of what could be the last transporter from Earth. A mystery that tests the heart of human life begins to reveal itself.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: News of a missing survival shuttle sends Cass, Fleur and Jack outside the settlement in search of Stella's daughter.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: A whiteout of unprecedented strength threatens to destroy Forthaven. Stella and Tate enlist Tipper to help prepare for the oncoming disaster.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: When a rogue AC enters Forthaven and attacks a citizen, Cass and Fleur must control the situation.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Patrick Baxter, a Carpathian legend thought dead, arrives in Forthaven with a fist full of diamonds and stories of "bodies" outside the settlement.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: When missing expeditionary Josie Hunter walks back into the settlement unharmed, the jubilant air quickly takes a darker tone: Josie is different.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Cass's past smashes into his present when he finds a note threatening to expose his real identity.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: When a deadly new virus hits Forthaven, Tate and Stella fear it's the host force answering their attempts at communication.
episodes.title: Episode 8

video.title: Outcasts
video.synopsis: This sci-fi drama focuses on a frontier town on the planet Carpathia, a region colonized by settlers who fleed war and nuclear devastation on Earth.
